channel.title: Blog was not built in a day
channel.description: Recent content on Blog was not built in a day

item.title: A Thank You Note
item.description: I am writing this on March 2nd 2021, the first eve of a very strict lockdown in Czechia. Another one. Let’s rewind a year back. In late March 2020, the COVID-19 started to spread uncontrollably in Czechia for the first time. I was all set to start a new job on April 1st, I was looking forward to it, and I was a little scared about starting a new job remotely.
